items.text: short ball outside off, some room too and Mushfiqur plays the upper cut towards third man
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: punched off the back foot just behind square, and Nicholls puts in a dive to his right to save a few. Might make Ferguson feel a bit better
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: short ball just about down the leg side and it's not called a wide. First bouncer of the over
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: back of length jut outside off, he defends close to the pitch and wants one but is sent back immediately
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: nice line and length outside off, opens the face of the bat just a bit to defend to off
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: hint of room outside off and the slow pace allows Mushfiqur to tap it late to third man
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: yet another wide from de Grandhomme. This one on length but well down the leg side
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: little full outside off and driven hard to cover where half a dive stops the ball
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: on middle and leg, no room and he defends to midwicket this time
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: straight bat, head down a a solid defence for the length ball just outside off
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: too full and just outside off, straight bat again but this time there's some power in it as Mithun drills it down the ground, just past the bowler for four
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, FOUR runs

items.text: back of length outside off and he helps it to point off the back foot
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 145kmh, beaten for pace and bounce outside off. Bangs it in on back of length outside off, Mushfiqur chases and misses
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: more confident foot work from Mushfiqur as he leans a bit into the ball outside off and drives it between point and cover point for three
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, 3 runs

items.text: bit of extra bounce outside off, there's a bit of room and he helps it late to third man
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: bit of forward lean on the off side and he pushes it into the off side
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: oh he's chopped on again! Outside off from Ferguson, just enough room for the batsman to push it towards point or third man but Mushfiqur doesn't use his feet at all and stick his bat out, gets a thick inside edge and onto the stumps. Big relief for Taylor and Ferguson
items.postText: Brendon : "Dear oh dear our fielding has not being great this far, we could have them 6 down for not many..." Reminds me of that second ODI against Sri Lanka when they put down five or six chances
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT

items.text: short of a length and shaping away outside off, cut to sweeper
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: full and down at the pads, flicked with the angle to fine leg
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: full and down leg side, can't get bat on this
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide

items.text: length on leg stump, dropped in front of midwicket with soft hands
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, mistimed drive on the front foot to extra cover. Pushing well away from the body there
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full outside off, leans in this time and gets his weight through the drive. To mid-off's left
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, defended off the inside half of the bat
items.postText: sarat: "Batting performances like this at top of the order is what is causing B'desh management to not drop Saifuddin, batsman needs to bring confidence to add extra bowler, which is not happening "
items.shortText: de Grandhomme to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: overpitched outside off, chopped straight to cover point
items.shortText: Ferguson to Mahmudullah, no run
